title: House of Blood and Teeth
description: Content A house on a quiet street in Wisconsin. A new family with a recent tragic loss. Why are the Ingrams suffering strange injuries that never heal? And what is hiding in their house? The truth will change the Ingrams forever."House of Blood and Teeth is a brutal journey haunted by grief and dread. Maxwell Bauman deftly crafts the claustrophobia of the dysfunctional family."--Tiffany Morris, author of Havoc in Silence"House of Blood and Teeth is a harrowing tale of grief, and how it manifests inside of us before oozing out to destroy the world around us. Highly recommended!"--doungjai gam, author of glass slipper dreams, shattered
author: Maxwell Bauman
